basic_information.scholarship_name: Outdoor and Community Recreation Alumni Endowed Scholarship

description: This fund provides scholarships to students within the Department of Kinesiology and Health Studies. Eligibility Requirements Student must be majoring in Outdoor and Community Recreation Demonstrate financial need Recipient must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
